targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  avg(temp_air-273.15) AS "temp_air",
  avg(ghi) AS "ghi"
FROM cosmo
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  country = 'DE'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  avg(SQRT(POWER(wind_meridional,2)+POWER(wind_zonal,2))) AS "wind_speed"
FROM cosmo
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sum(nuclear) + sum(coal) +  sum(water) + sum(bio) + sum(gas) + sum(lignite) + sum(wind) + sum(solar) as "total"
FROM capacities
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sum(bio) AS "bio",
  sum(wind) AS "wind",
  sum(solar) AS "solar",
  sum(coal) AS "coal",
  sum(lignite) AS "lignite",
  sum(gas) AS "gas",
  sum(water) AS "water",
  sum(storage) AS "storage",
  sum(nuclear) AS "nuclear"
FROM capacities
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  agent NOT LIKE 'dem_de%'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  price*1000 AS "price",
  avg(price*1000) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS 5 PRECEDING) AS "price_mean"
FROM auction_results
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg("0") AS "entsoe_price"
FROM query_day_ahead_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(dem.time,1h),
  sum(dem.power) - sum(gen.solar) as "demand"
FROM demand dem
JOIN generation gen on gen.agent = dem.agent and $__timeFilter(dem.time) 
  and time_bucket('1h', dem.time) = time_bucket('1h', gen.time)
WHERE dem.step = 'post_dayAhead' and gen.step = 'post_dayAhead' and dem.agent LIKE '%dem%' 
  
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(volume) AS "market volume",
  sum(magic_source) as "magic source"
FROM auction_results
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(nuclear) + sum(coal) + sum(lignite) + sum(gas) as "fossil energy",
  sum(water) + sum(bio) + sum(wind) +  sum(solar) AS "renewable energy"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead' AND
  agent not like '%dem%'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(nuclear) AS "nuclear",
  sum(coal) AS "coal",
  sum(water) AS "water",
  sum(bio) AS "bio",
  sum(gas) AS "gas",
  sum(lignite) AS "lignite",
  sum(wind) AS "wind",
  sum(solar) AS "solar"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  agent AS metric,
  sum(lignite) AS "lignite",
  sum(gas) AS "gas",
  sum(nuclear) AS "nuclear",
  sum(coal) AS "coal",
  sum(allocation) AS "allocation"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead' AND
  agent = '$agent'
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  max(price)*100 AS "agent price",
  sum(volume) AS "volume"
FROM orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  agent = '$agent'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  avg(price*100) AS "market price"
FROM auction_results
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  max(forecast) as "max forecast",
  avg(forecast) AS "average forecast",
  min(forecast) as "min forcast"
  
FROM cash_flows
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  avg(forecast) AS "agent forecast"
FROM cash_flows
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") and
  agent = '$agent'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  max(price) AS "actual_price"
FROM auction_results
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(profit-emission-start_ups-fuel)/100
FROM cash_flows
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") and
  agent = '$agent'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(profit)/100 as "Revenue"
FROM cash_flows
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") and
  agent = '$agent'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum((profit-emission-start_ups-fuel)/100) AS "Gross Profit",
  sum(emission)/100 AS "Emission Costs",
  sum(start_ups)/100 AS "Starting Costs",
  sum(fuel)/100 AS "Fuel Costs",
  sum(profit)/100 AS "Revenue"
FROM cash_flows
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  agent = '$agent'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(fuel)/100 as "Fuel Costs"
FROM cash_flows
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") and
  agent = '$agent'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(emission)/100 as "Emission Costs"
FROM cash_flows
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") and
  agent = '$agent'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(start_ups)/100 as "Starting Costs"
FROM cash_flows
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") and
  agent = '$agent'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(nuclear) AS "Simulation"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  nuclear * 1e3 AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(lignite) AS "Simulation"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  "fossil_brown_coal/lignite" * 1e3 AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(coal) AS "Simulation"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  fossil_hard_coal * 1e3 AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(gas) AS "Simulation"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  fossil_gas * 1e3 AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(solar) AS "Simulation"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  solar * 1e3 AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(wind) AS "Simulation"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  (wind_onshore + wind_offshore) * 1e3 AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(bio) AS "Simulation"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  biomass * 1e3 AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(water) AS "Simulation"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  "hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage" * 1e3 AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1h),
  sum(nuclear) AS "nuclear",
  sum(coal) AS "coal",
  sum(water) AS "water",
  sum(bio) AS "bio",
  sum(gas) AS "gas",
  sum(lignite) AS "lignite",
  sum(wind) AS "wind",
  sum(solar) AS "solar"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  index AS "time",
  biomass,
  "fossil_brown_coal/lignite",
  "fossil_coal-derived_gas",
  fossil_gas,
  fossil_hard_coal,
  fossil_oil,
  fossil_oil_shale,
  fossil_peat,
  geothermal,
  hydro_pumped_storage,
  "hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage",
  nuclear,
  wind_offshore,
  wind_onshore,
  solar
FROM query_installed_generation_capacity
WHERE
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  index AS "time",
  (biomass+solar+"fossil_gas"+"fossil_brown_coal/lignite"+"fossil_oil"+"fossil_hard_coal"+geothermal+other+waste+"wind_offshore"+"wind_onshore"+nuclear)*1e3 as total_entsoe
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  index AS "time",
  nuclear*1e3 as nuclear,
  "fossil_hard_coal"*1e3 as coal,
  ("hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage"+hydro_water_reservoir)*1e3 as water,
  biomass*1e3 as bio,
  ("fossil_coal-derived_gas"+"fossil_gas")*1e3 as gas,
  (fossil_oil+fossil_oil_shale+fossil_peat+"fossil_brown_coal/lignite")*1e3 as lignite,
  ("wind_offshore"+"wind_onshore")*1e3 as wind,
  solar*1e3 as solar,
  (geothermal+other+waste)*1e3 as others
FROM query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1
